t: Amazon Prints - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can create printing projects from your Amazon Photos collection with Amazon Prints. We'll deliver the prints to you. Amazon Prints is available to U.S. customers. We ship orders to U.S., APO, and FPO delivery addresses. Standard Shipping Deliveries may take longer to APO or FPO addresses.

t: Amazon Print on Demand – Connect Your Store With Printify

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: The horizontal “available at Amazon” logo must be no smaller than 1.4 inches wide for print, 140 px for 1x resolution screens, or 280 px for 2x resolution screens. To maintain brand integrity, do not alter the logo artwork, proportion, or color.

t: Canon requests removal of toner cartridges from Amazon.com, including Toner H-Party brand cartridges sold by True Printing | Canon Global
s: TOKYO, April 16, 2025—Canon Inc. today announced the filing of an infringement report with Amazon.com seeking the removal of Amazon.com listings for certain toner cartridges.
